text: Ni jwajinjile mu nsinda pa ndema janti achinsyene nsindao akakumanyilila, basi ni ŵasimene mwalakwemo ŵandu ŵaŵili ali nkumenyana – jwinejo jwakuumila mwikuga lyakwe (mu ŵanache ŵa Israila), sano jwinejo jwakuumila mwa amagongo ŵakwe. Sano ajula jwakuumila mwikuga lyakwe jwam’bendile chikamuchisyo pa ajula jwakuumila mwa amagongo ŵakwe, basi Musa ni ŵantwanjile suŵa ni kum’bulaga. Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ayi (yandesileyi) nimasengo gashetani; chisimu jwalakwe nimmagongo jwakusochelesya, jwakuonechela.”
